alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:39PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macomb and St. Clair Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harsens Island, or near Algonac, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Marine City around 445 PM EDT. New Baltimore around 450 PM EDT. Richmond and St. Clair around 500 PM EDT. Memphis around 505 PM EDT. Emmett around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Anchorville, North Street, Adair, Lynn Township, Rattle Run, Goodells, Brockway, Smiths Creek, Fair Haven and Wadhams. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
